Title: Requires license plates and liability insurance for limited use motorcycles
Summary: Requires license plates and liability insurance for limited use motorcycles.
LawCode: Add Art 34-E §§1290 & 1291, amd §2265, V & T L; amd §5103, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring license plates and liability insurance for limited use motorcycles and to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring liability insurance for Class C limited use motorcycles
